citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 12:00PM on May
27th, 2021. The owner was contacted by phone and stated that he was unavailable.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 12:00PM on May 
27th, 2021. The owner was contacted by phone and stated that he was unavailable. 
 
 
 
End Section
